H0.text: In which English city is the HQ of the Ordnance Survey. London

H1.text: In which English city is the HQ of the Ordnance Survey. Manchester

H2.text: In which English city is the HQ of the Ordnance Survey. Bristol

H3.text: In which English city is the HQ of the Ordnance Survey. Soton

A4.text: The Ordnance Survey's headquarters is located in Southampton.

A5.text: A new head office building was constructed in Adanac Park on the outskirts of Southampton.
